title: Good but not Great
review: It found interesting to present Armstrong in this angle. However it should spend more time to build up the relationship between Armstrong and his daughter. Shakey cam is a fun way to present situation inside rocket and plane but it is over use and I cant see the detail. Ryan Gosling and Claire Foy did a great job here. All in all, it is a good film to watch but it is not as good as Whiplash and La La Land.
